title: Sea CEO Forrest Li on US$1 trillion market cap with AI
description: Sea's CEO Forrest Li envisions a path to a US$1 trillion market cap for the e-commerce leader, driven by strategic investments in artificial intelligence. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:

title: Dan Ives Predicts Apple's Next Catalyst After iPhone 17 Surge As Cupertino Advances Toward The $4 Trillion Club
description: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives said Apple is on the verge of hitting a $4 trillion market cap, calling the iPhone 17 a major success and predicting the company's next big growth catalyst will be its upcoming artificial intelligence roadmap.
content:
As Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) comes closer to joining the $4 trillion market cap club, Wedbush analyst Dan Ives predicts the next big catalyst for the iPhone-maker.

title: Central Asia’s biggest state continues to push political reforms
description: Kazakhstan is embarking on major political and socioeconomic reforms. President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev highlighted the importance of upcoming parliamentary reform. The country is moving towards a unicameral Parliament. This reform aims to enhance efficiency and citizen participation. Digitalization and artificial intelligence will play a key role.

title: Sex Is a Big Market for the AI Industry: ChatGPT Won't Be the First to Try to Profit From It
description: ChatGPT will be able to have kinkier conversations after OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced the artificial intelligence company will soon allow its chatbot to engage in “erotica for verified adults."OpenAI won't be the first to try to profit from sexualized AI. Sexual content was a top draw for AI tools almost as soon as the boom in AI-generated imagery and words erupted in 2022.
content:

title: AI tool saves NHS staff five weeks of admin a year
description: Artificial intelligence trial frees up medics for front-line duties
content:
Artificial intelligence is saving NHS staff members an average five weeks a year, a trial of the technology has suggested, as part of a productivity drive.

title: University of Strathclyde invites applications for AI-focused MSc programme
description: The University of Strathclyde, Glasgow, has opened applications for its MSc in Machine Learning and Deep Learning for the January 2026 intake. The interdisciplinary programme equips students with advanced AI, data analytics, and software engineering skills through hands-on projects and research-led training, preparing them for global careers in artificial intelligence and intelligent systems.
content:
The University of Strathclyde, Glasgow, has officially opened admissions for its Master of Science (MSc) in Machine Learning and Deep Learning programme for the January 2026 intake.

title: Gen AI Memory Startup
description: Supermemory, which was created by Mumbai wunderkind Dhravya Shah and invested in by Google's leading AI executives, is transforming how artificial intelligence recollects, comprehends, and tailors user context. Shah's ambitious vision and universal memory API for AI applications is gaining the interest of Big Tech and investors due to revolutionary multimodal data extraction, blindingly fast performance, and paradigm-shifting use cases for consumers and developers. Read on for behind-the-scenes insights into Supermemory's development, its competitive advantage, and how it may reshape memory in the generative AI era.

title: WCM warns of AI phonies that are putting investors at risk
description: Money manager Ryan Quinn says there are plenty of lower quality companies benefiting from making a loose connection to artificial intelligence.
content:
WCM Investment portfolio manager Ryan Quinn has warned his Australian clients that amid the euphoria for artificial intelligence-related stocks, there are charlatans that could lead to big losses once the market bubble finally bursts.
